history.proof: intros n H. destruct n. - qsimpl. - simpl. destruct n. + reflexivity. + rewrite <- pred_succZ. reflexivity.

exceptions.exn: The reference pred_succ was not found in the current environment.

original: intros n H. destruct n. - intros H0. inversion H0. - simpl. destruct n. + simpl. reflexivity. + rewrite <- pred_succ. reflexivity.
